title: Under
lyrics:
You’re moving so close to me baby
It don’t feel that close enough
All of this distance, these maybes
All those saying it’s that stuff (it’s that stuff)
Couldn’t kept close, kept you floating
Underneath that breeze behind

And I don’t wanna wait ‘til the morning

For you to tell me that you’re fine



No good at finding it, no good at finding

No good at finding, no good at finding



Never in mind, I’ll take you under

Just so you stay again

Raise in the spring, lose in the summer

You’ve got to feel this way



Oh, I’mma try to get there in forty

If Chris is driving then it’s give or take

I tell you you’re the one, you’re my only

How she still so far away



She’s no good at hiding (she’s so good at hiding, she’s so good)

She’s no good at hiding (she’s so good at hiding baby)

She’s no good at hiding (she’s so good at hiding, she’s so good)

No good at hiding



Never in mind, I’ll take you under

Just so you stay again

Raise in the spring, lose in the summer

You’ve got to feel this way



Never in mind (she’s so good at hiding), I’ll take you under (she’s so good)

Just so you’ll stay again (she’s so good at hiding baby)

Raise in the spring (she’s so good at hiding), lose in the summer (she’s so good at hiding)

You’ve got to feel this way



Never in mind, I’ll take you under

You’ve got me feeling this way
